verses.kjv: This is the book of the generations of Adam. In the day that God created man, in the likeness of God made he him;
verses.ct: This is the record of Adam's descendants. When God created humanity, he made them in the likeness of God.

verses.kjv: Male and female created he them; and blessed them, and called their name Adam, in the day when they were created.
verses.ct: He created them male and female, blessed them, and named them Adam when they were created.

verses.kjv: And Adam lived an hundred and thirty years, and begat a son in his own likeness, after his image; and called his name Seth:
verses.ct: When Adam was 130 years old, he became the father of a son who was just like him, in his own likeness. He named him Seth.

verses.kjv: And the days of Adam after he had begotten Seth were eight hundred years: and he begat sons and daughters:
verses.ct: After Seth was born, Adam lived another 800 years and became the father of other sons and daughters.

verses.kjv: And all the days that Adam lived were nine hundred and thirty years: and he died.
verses.ct: Adam's total lifespan was 930 years, and then he died.

verses.kjv: And Seth lived an hundred and five years, and begat Enos:
verses.ct: When Seth was 105 years old, he became the father of Enos.

verses.kjv: And Seth lived after he begat Enos eight hundred and seven years, and begat sons and daughters:
verses.ct: After Enos was born, Seth lived another 807 years and became the father of other sons and daughters.

verses.kjv: And all the days of Seth were nine hundred and twelve years: and he died.
verses.ct: Seth's total lifespan was 912 years, and then he died.

verses.kjv: And Enos lived ninety years, and begat Cainan:
verses.ct: When Enos was 90 years old, he became the father of Cainan.

verses.kjv: And Enos lived after he begat Cainan eight hundred and fifteen years, and begat sons and daughters:
verses.ct: After Cainan was born, Enos lived another 815 years and became the father of other sons and daughters.

verses.kjv: And all the days of Enos were nine hundred and five years: and he died.
verses.ct: Enos's total lifespan was 905 years, and then he died.

verses.kjv: And Cainan lived seventy years, and begat Mahalaleel:
verses.ct: When Cainan was 70 years old, he became the father of Mahalaleel.

verses.kjv: And Cainan lived after he begat Mahalaleel eight hundred and forty years, and begat sons and daughters:
verses.ct: After Mahalaleel was born, Cainan lived another 840 years and became the father of other sons and daughters.

verses.kjv: And all the days of Cainan were nine hundred and ten years: and he died.
verses.ct: Cainan's total lifespan was 910 years, and then he died.

verses.kjv: And Mahalaleel lived sixty and five years, and begat Jared:
verses.ct: When Mahalaleel was 65 years old, he became the father of Jared.

verses.kjv: And Mahalaleel lived after he begat Jared eight hundred and thirty years, and begat sons and daughters:
verses.ct: After Jared was born, Mahalaleel lived another 830 years and became the father of other sons and daughters.

verses.kjv: And all the days of Mahalaleel were eight hundred ninety and five years: and he died.
verses.ct: Mahalaleel's total lifespan was 895 years, and then he died.

verses.kjv: And Jared lived an hundred sixty and two years, and he begat Enoch:
verses.ct: When Jared was 162 years old, he became the father of Enoch.

verses.kjv: And Jared lived after he begat Enoch eight hundred years, and begat sons and daughters:
verses.ct: After Enoch was born, Jared lived another 800 years and became the father of other sons and daughters.

verses.kjv: And all the days of Jared were nine hundred sixty and two years: and he died.
verses.ct: Jared's total lifespan was 962 years, and then he died.

verses.kjv: And Enoch lived sixty and five years, and begat Methuselah:
verses.ct: When Enoch was 65 years old, he became the father of Methuselah.

verses.kjv: And Enoch walked with God after he begat Methuselah three hundred years, and begat sons and daughters:
verses.ct: After Methuselah was born, Enoch walked closely with God for 300 years and became the father of other sons and daughters.

verses.kjv: And all the days of Enoch were three hundred sixty and five years:
verses.ct: Enoch's total time on earth was 365 years.

verses.kjv: And Enoch walked with God: and he was not; for God took him.
verses.ct: Enoch walked closely with God, and then he was gone, because God took him away.

verses.kjv: And Methuselah lived an hundred eighty and seven years, and begat Lamech:
verses.ct: When Methuselah was 187 years old, he became the father of Lamech.

verses.kjv: And Methuselah lived after he begat Lamech seven hundred eighty and two years, and begat sons and daughters:
verses.ct: After Lamech was born, Methuselah lived another 782 years and became the father of other sons and daughters.

verses.kjv: And all the days of Methuselah were nine hundred sixty and nine years: and he died.
verses.ct: Methuselah's total lifespan was 969 years, and then he died.

verses.kjv: And Lamech lived an hundred eighty and two years, and begat a son:
verses.ct: When Lamech was 182 years old, he became the father of a son.

verses.kjv: And he called his name Noah, saying, This same shall comfort us concerning our work and toil of our hands, because of the ground which the LORD hath cursed.
verses.ct: He named him Noah, saying, "This one will bring us relief from our hard labor and the painful work of our hands, caused by the ground that the LORD has cursed."

verses.kjv: And Lamech lived after he begat Noah five hundred ninety and five years, and begat sons and daughters:
verses.ct: After Noah was born, Lamech lived another 595 years and became the father of other sons and daughters.

verses.kjv: And all the days of Lamech were seven hundred seventy and seven years: and he died.
verses.ct: Lamech's total lifespan was 777 years, and then he died.

verses.kjv: And Noah was five hundred years old: and Noah begat Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
verses.ct: By the time Noah was 500 years old, he had become the father of Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
